name: DailySignal
text:
Some governors have opted to pause reopening plans following a surge of #COVID19 cases in their states.

As a result, some have claimed that means reopening plans are not working—but that's not the case: https://t.co/zAy9Gjl3sw

name: DailySignal
text: #SCOTUS just held that families have a right to seek the best educational opportunities for their children, by preventing states from blocking the participation of religiously affiliated schools in #stat school choice programs. https://t.co/k4tToWuwtz

name: DailySignal
text: “While I do not believe for a moment democracy is fragile, it does require careful stewardship and constant vigilance.” @SecPompeo  https://t.co/0zurxYqzRL

name: DailySignal
text:
#SCOTUS reaffirmed what most Americans take for granted—that the Constitution prohibits religious discrimination. 

But the 5-4 divide among the justices shows that religious freedom is not fully secure in America: https://t.co/VPjoMp3yh3
